scripts.build:slides: cp -p themes/*.css output && asciidoctor -r asciidoctor-revealjs -r asciidoctor-diagram -b revealjs -a allow-uri-read sample.adoc -o output/slides.html
scripts.build:pdf: asciidoctor-pdf -r asciidoctor-diagram -a pdf-theme=japanese -a pdf-themesdir=themes -a allow-uri-read sample.adoc -o output/handout.pdf
scripts.dev: npm run build:slides && echo 'Open output/slides.html in your browser'
